name: get_chinese_hot_topics
description: Fetches the hot topics data (in chinese) from a specific source, such as Douyin, Weibo, Zhihu, Baidu, and more.

type.description: The source of the hot topics. Options include 'zhihu', 'weibo', 'baidu', 'history', 'bilihot', 'biliall', 'sspai', 'douyin', 'csdn'.
